PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-03472013-03-28,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectCanadian Air Transport Security Authority ** Indemnity Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving that the Minister of Transport enter into an INDEMNITY AGREEMENT in order to enable the Canadian Air Transport Security Authority (CATSA) to cease purchasing War Risk insurance and instead, the Crown will indemnify the CATSA and its screening contractors for this risk.
AttachmentsAttachment
